subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: It was Cavendish’s 26th stage win at the Tour and a rebuttal to critics who said he lost a sprint earlier in the race by starting his final push too far from the finish.
snippet: It was Cavendish’s 26th stage win at the Tour and a rebuttal to critics who said he lost a sprint earlier in the race by starting his final push too far from the finish.
